EmailTemplate.name: Expired Close Date
EmailTemplate.subject: Close Date has expired on this Open Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
Just a note to let you know that the Close Date is expired on this Open Opportunity. Please update it.
{!Opportunity.Name}
Thanks,
Madeline Krazit, Salesforce Administrator
phone: 201.847.2122 email: mkrazit@dt.com website: www.dt.com
